title: Fitness Tracker
challenges: This project is one of the first projects I built using React.js. It was difficult to learn/apply useState and other concepts from React.
role: I coded the functionality of the project. Some of the styling and page layout code was provided to me by my Instructor.
features: Utilizes MongoDB Atlas to maintain a server connection to a database
Applies React Fundamentals to append database information in graph form

title: PWA Budget Tracker
challenges: This project revolved around using a service worker to give the app an offline functionality. Learning where to implement the service worker and achieving offline functionality was a challenge
role: I coded the functionality of the project. Some of the styling and page layout code was provided to me by my Instructor.
features: Utilizes a service worker to work offline and communicate with a DB
Stores the past transactions user has input in a Mongo DB
Offline functionality and caching of offline data
